text: Kees Brusse (6 February 1925 - 9 December 2013)Acteur Kees Brusse overleden was a Dutch actor and movie director. He appeared in 47 movie and television shows since 1936. He starred in the 1975 movie Dokter Pulder zaait papavers. It was entered into the 26th Berlin International Film Festival. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Kees Brusse at Virtual History Category:1925 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch movie directors Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:Actors from Rotterdam
title: Kees Brusse
